ComicInfo.Title: The Rise and Fall of the Super-Skrull; King of the Mole Men
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Rise and Fall of the Super-Skrull: When the Super-Skrull attacks the Fantastic Four once again, an accident freezes him in the form of Reed Richards. He returns home, but is condemned for his failure, only partially repairing his reputation by preventing Galactus from eating his planet.
King of the Mole Men: A small army of Moloids descends on the FF, claiming that the Mole Man is missing and that the Thing is their new ruler.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:35:08. [Issue ID 916774]
ComicInfo.Characters: Human Torch [Johnny Storm],Galactus,Fantastic Four [Thing,Super-Skrull [Kl'rt],Mr. Fantastic,Emperor Dorrek,Silver Surfer (cameo),Invisible Woman],Franklin Richards (cameo)
